title: Reduce energy consumption by using LED bulbs
action: Replace all incandescent bulbs in your home with energy-efficient LED bulbs to save electricity.
impact: LED bulbs use up to 80% less energy and last 25 times longer than incandescent bulbs.

title: Compost your food waste
action: Start a compost bin for your kitchen scraps and garden waste to reduce landfill waste.
impact: Composting reduces methane emissions from landfills and enriches soil naturally.

title: Use public transport or carpool
action: Opt for public transportation, biking, or carpooling to reduce your carbon footprint.
impact: Reducing single-occupancy vehicle trips lowers greenhouse gas emissions.

title: Save water by fixing leaks
action: Regularly check and repair dripping taps and leaking pipes to conserve water.
impact: Fixing leaks can save hundreds of gallons of water per year.

title: Eat seasonal and local produce
action: Choose fruits and vegetables that are in season and grown locally to reduce food miles.
impact: Eating local reduces transportation emissions and supports local farmers.

title: Reduce plastic use
action: Avoid single-use plastics by using reusable bags, bottles, and containers.
impact: Cutting down plastic waste helps protect oceans and wildlife.

title: Install a programmable thermostat
action: Use a programmable thermostat to optimize heating and cooling schedules.
impact: Efficient temperature control reduces energy consumption and bills.

title: Support community clean-up events
action: Participate in or organize local clean-up drives to keep your neighborhood clean.
impact: Community efforts improve local environment and foster social bonds.

title: Reduce meat consumption
action: Incorporate more plant-based meals into your diet to lower environmental impact.
impact: Reducing meat intake decreases greenhouse gas emissions and water usage.

title: Use rainwater harvesting
action: Collect rainwater for gardening and non-potable uses to conserve water.
impact: Rainwater harvesting reduces demand on municipal water supplies.
